# ðŸ“Š Reports & Visualizations

This folder contains model performance reports and visualizations.

## Generated Files

After running the notebooks, you will find:

### Model Performance
- `model_performance.csv` - Comparison of all trained models
- `model_comparison.png` - ROC curves and confusion matrix
- `feature_importance.png` - Top 10 most important features

### EDA Outputs
- `orders_analysis.png` - Order distribution and delivery statistics
- `crm_analysis.png` - Customer ratings and complaint patterns
- `sentiment_analysis.png` - Comment sentiment distributions

## Quick Stats

The reports will show:
- âœ… Model ROC-AUC scores
- âœ… Precision, Recall, F1 scores
- âœ… Feature importance rankings
- âœ… Data distribution insights

---

**Note:** Run all notebooks in the `notebooks/` folder to generate these reports.
